pages.heading: Call of Duty
pages.paragraph: Call of Duty is a 2003 first-person shooter game developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision. .

pages.heading: React JS
pages.paragraph: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components by Facebook .

pages.heading: Javascript
pages.paragraph: JavaScript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language and core technology of the Web.
